import React,{useEffect,useRef}from'react';import'./MapPanel.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MapPanel=()=>{const mapRef=useRef(null);const mapInstance=useRef(null);useEffect(()=>{if(!mapRef.current||!window.kakao)return;// 현재 위치를 가져오는 함수
const getCurrentLocation=()=>{if(navigator.geolocation){navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(position=>{const{latitude,longitude}=position.coords;// 카카오 지도 생성
const options={center:new window.kakao.maps.LatLng(latitude,longitude),level:3};mapInstance.current=new window.kakao.maps.Map(mapRef.current,options);// 현재 위치 마커 생성
new window.kakao.maps.Marker({position:new window.kakao.maps.LatLng(latitude,longitude),map:mapInstance.current});},error=>{console.error('Error getting location:',error);// 기본 위치 (서울시청)
const defaultLocation={latitude:37.5665,longitude:126.9780};const options={center:new window.kakao.maps.LatLng(defaultLocation.latitude,defaultLocation.longitude),level:3};mapInstance.current=new window.kakao.maps.Map(mapRef.current,options);});}};getCurrentLocation();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"map-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"map-panel",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"panel-title",children:"Map"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{ref:mapRef,className:"map-view"})]})});};export default MapPanel;
